metadata.title: CVE-2021-21170 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Loader in Google Chrome prior to 89.0.4389.72allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process to spoofthe contents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
